overview: Oleg A. Alexeyev is a CEO of LEX Partnership - Russian based company specializing in Internet technologies. Oleg A. Alexeyev was born in a small town not far from Saint Petersburg, graduated FINEC University as a Master of Business Administration. Oleg A. Alexeyev started his first business in 2009 having only 3 dollars as a starting capital. For the next two years LEX Partnership discovered a highly competitive brand ‘Websimka’ in web design average sector. Now the company goes on exploring new markets in Russian provinces, giving a brand new look of what a website shoulÐ² be look like.
